OTHER INTERESTING EXPERIENCE:
I am an Idaho boy that grow up working on a farm/ranch. I have worked in construction and the welding industries. I would say I am well rounding in learning and being able to do new things do to my many hobbies that I have. One in particular is growing giant pumpkins. I have been growing giants for about 3 years. My largest pumpkin was 1200 lbs. I am working towards braking the Idaho record of over 1400 lbs. I love to learn and then bring my experience into my classroom for my students.
